definition: any of various small butterflies of the family Lycaenidae having coppery wings, to coat with a layer of copper
details:
noun
- any of various small butterflies of the family Lycaenidae having coppery wings
- a reddish-brown color resembling the color of polished copper
= synonyms: copper color
- uncomplimentary terms for a policeman
= synonyms: bull
- a copper penny
- a ductile malleable reddish-brown corrosion-resistant diamagnetic metallic element
verb
- to coat with a layer of copper
= example: to coat with a layer of copper
